introduction.title: A Changing Climate's Impacts on Mesoamerican Reefs
introduction.subhead: The coastal regions of Mexico, Belize, and Guatemala are known for their beautiful beaches, productive reefs, and thriving communities. To prepare for climate change's impacts on this region, the ADVANCE project has created an interactive map to visualize the latest climate forecasts.
